attributes.action: Give the nation a one off, two day additional bank holiday once COVID is over
attributes.additional_details: It would provide an opportunity for us to put this nightmare behind us and celebrate moving forward.
attributes.background: Give us a two day extra bank holiday once we have beaten COVID to celebrate, lift the public mood and make up for all of our cancelled birthdays, anniversary’s, Christmas and New Year plans

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Create a one off Bank Holiday on Monday June 21st 2021.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205

Create UK Bank Holidays on 25th and 28th June 2021 in lieu of Christmas 2020
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564183

Make 26th & 27th July 2021 a one off Double Bank Holiday - Christmas in July!
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561169

Create extra bank holidays to make up for those that took place under COVID.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564471

Extra Bank Holiday when Covid restrictions are finally lifted
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563958
